user_query: I'm a travel blogger and I want to showcase different webcams on my website. Fetch the list of webcams ordered randomly. Also, provide me with a map tile in French with labels for a visually appealing display.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random list of webcams from a webcam API.
Call a mapping API to generate a map tile with French labels.
TaskList.dependency: Step 1 provides the webcam location data needed for this task.
